About Terms

Privacy Policy

Our Commitment

At collectif, we prioritize privacy and anonymity above all else. Our platform is designed to protect whistleblowers, sources, and users while maintaining the highest standards of operational security.

Data Collection

We minimize data collection to protect our users:

  • We do not collect personally identifiable information
  • We do not use tracking cookies
  • We do not maintain user session data
  • We do not log IP addresses
  • We do not store browser fingerprints

Anonymous Submissions

For whistleblowers and sources:

  • All submissions are encrypted end-to-end
  • Metadata is stripped from submitted files
  • Source identities are never recorded
  • Submission logs are automatically purged

Secure Communication

For secure communication with our team:

  • Use our PGP key for encrypted messages
  • Connect through Tor for enhanced anonymity
  • Use secure drop for sensitive documents
  • Avoid including personal identifiers in communications

Third-Party Services

We do not use:

  • Third-party analytics
  • Social media trackers
  • Advertisement networks
  • User behavior tracking

Data Retention

Our data retention policy:

  • All communication logs are automatically purged
  • Temporary files are securely deleted
  • Backup systems exclude user data
  • Server memory is regularly cleared

Security Measures

We implement multiple layers of security:

  • End-to-end encryption for all communications
  • Regular security audits
  • Hardened server configurations
  • Air-gapped systems for sensitive data

Transparency

We are committed to transparency:

  • Regular warrant canary updates
  • Public security audits
  • Open source security components
  • Immediate disclosure of security incidents

Contact

For privacy-related inquiries:

  • Use our PGP key for encrypted communication
  • Contact through secure channels only
  • Do not include personal information

run by CollectifHQ • founded by a team of former mainstream journalists tired of corporate media censorship
